meta_description: PAAM is a nationally recognized, fine arts institution that encompasses the creative energy of America’s oldest active art colony through exhibition, education, and celebration of culture.
hours_text:
# Visit

_Recent Gifts from the Collection, 2025_

### Visit PAAM and discover the depth of the Provincetown Art Colony and its connection to American art history. In our five galleries, you will explore artwork created by Provincetown artists, both historic and contemporary, and draw connections to the art movements that have shaped our world.

Our program of [exhibitions](https://paam.org/exhibitions/ "exhibitions") changes on a regular basis, and frequently features work from our growing [permanent collection](https://paam.org/collection/ "permanent collection"). There is no charge to visit our Museum Store or to attend an opening/artist reception, held periodically throughout the year on Friday evenings (view the schedule on our [Events Calendar](https://paam.org/events-calendar/ "Events Calendar")). 

The administrative offices and [Lillian Orlowsky and William Freed Museum School](https://paam.org/education/ "Lillian Orlowsky and William Freed Museum School") are located on the second floor, which is currently open only to students and teaching artists currently engaged in a workshop, or those with an appointment to see a [staff member](https://paam.org/about-paam/staff/ "staff member").

## HOURS AND ADMISSION

PAAM is currently open Thursday-Sunday from 12-5pm.

The Museum is closed on Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day, and open on New Years Day and Monday holidays (Martin Luther King Jr. Day, President’s Day, Patriot’s Day, Memorial Day, Indigenous Peoples’ Day, Vet...

[ ON VIEW THROUGH FEBRUARY 1 Portals and Perspectives: Recent Gifts to the Collection  ](https://paam.org/recent-gifts-to-the-collection/ "From The CEO") [ OFFERED YEAR-ROUND Workshops  ](https://paam.org/education/workshops/) [ OPEN 12-5PM, THURSDAY-SUNDAY Visit!  ](https://paam.org/visit/)

### [Membership Whether you’re an artist or an art appreciator, PAAM Membership opens the door to programs that enrich and inspire. PAAM members are the heart and soul of our organization. Annual… ](https://paam.org/members/ "Membership")

### [Members’ Juried Opening Friday, January 16. Each year PAAM mounts upwards of 5 members’ open and juried exhibitions in which participants display their work alongside some of America’s most noteworthy artists. ](https://paam.org/members-juried-2026/ "Members' Juried")

### [The Lillian Orlowsky and William Freed Grant Due April 1, 2026. The Lillian Orlowsky and William Freed Grant is awarded annually to under-recognized American painters over the age of 45 who demonstrate financial need. ](https://paam.org/education/the-lillian-orlowsky-and-william-freed-grant/ "The Lillian Orlowsky and William Freed Grant")
